String.string: Please destroy the {@creature:46#7003#haxuul extractor} and get samples.
Thank you for bringing samples from the {@creature:46#7003#haxuul extractor}.

Pass through the {@creature:46#202#argonomorph kulkari shaman} guarding the rooms in {@Rgn:46002$$Raga Evala} of {@Rgn:46001$$the Three Towers} and destroy the {@creature:46#7003#haxuul extractor}. Then get samples.
Return to the {@Rgn:46020$$Shineroot Chamber} and deliver the collected plant samples to {@linkcreature:246#1024$$Platanok}.
